target: All right, sure. The postal code is cb28rj and the address is 151 Hills Road. Their phone number is 01223247942. Anything else?
context: <user>  I want to find a moderately priced place to stay that has at least a 3-star rating <system>  which side of town do you prefer? <user>  Any area is okay as long as the hotel includes free parking. I don't need internet. <system>  Bridge guest house has all that you need, would you like to book that? <user>  yes please book it for 1 <system>  What day would you like ? <user>  3 days and get me phone number, postcode, and address please <system>  I will need the day you plan on arriving.<user>  Actually I am don't need to book a room just yet but can you provide the phone number, postcode, and address. <system>
